column1: A. O. SMITH (CHINA) ENVIRONMENTAL PRODUCTS CO., LTD.
column4: Industrial Machinery and Supplies and Components
column13: A. O. SMITH (CHINA) ENVIRONMENTAL PRODUCTS CO., LTD. produces and sells environmental appliances such as water purifiers, air purifiers, and water softeners. It offers products such as household water purification, commercial water purification, air purification, and jianit water purification. The company provides research and development laboratory for water treatment and inspection and testing for product and component. A. O. SMITH (CHINA) ENVIRONMENTAL PRODUCTS CO., LTD. was formerly known as A. O. Smith (Shanghai) Water Treatment Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to A. O. SMITH (CHINA) ENVIRONMENTAL PRODUCTS CO., LTD. in May 2018. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Nanjing, China. A. O. SMITH (CHINA) ENVIRONMENTAL PRODUCTS CO., LTD. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

column1: A. O. Smith (China) Investment Co., Ltd.

column1: A. O. Smith (China) Water Heater Co., Ltd.
column13: A. O. Smith (China) Water Heater Co., Ltd. manufactures water heaters for residential and commercial applications. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China. A. O. Smith (China) Water Heater Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

As of April 22, 2009, AO Smith Corp. was acquired by Smith Investment Company, in a reverse merger transaction. A. O. Smith Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of water heating equipment and electric motors for residential, commercial, and industrial end markets primarily in the United States, Mexico, China, and Canada. The company operates in two segments, Water Products and Electrical Products. The Water Products segment offers a line of residential gas and electric water heaters, commercial water heating equipment, copper-tube boilers, water treatment products, and water systems tanks. This segment’s products are used in range of applications, including hotels, laundries, car washes, factories, and institutions, as well as in large-volume hot water and hydronic heating applications. The Electrical Products segment provides various hermetic electric, fractional horsepower alternating current, and direct current motors. This segment’s products are used in air conditioning and refrigeration systems, fans and blowers in furnaces, and air conditioners and ventilating systems; and in other consumer products, such as home appliances, and pumps for swimming pools, hot tubs, and spas. The company sells its water heater products through plumbing wholesalers and retail outlets, and electric motor products to original equipment manufacturers and distributors. It has a strategic cooperative agreement with Chromagen Limited to develop advanced solar technology for water heating applications. A. O. Smith Corporation was founded in 1874 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

column13: A. O. Smith India is a company that manufactures water heaters in India. The company has a manufacturing plant located in Harohalli, just outside Bengaluru, with extensive engineering and technical resources. A. O. Smith India is known for its stylish design and features that are demanded by Indian consumers. They are also the first and only manufacturer in India to invest in and produce glass lined water heaters.
A. O. Smith International Corporation operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

column4: Industrial Machinery and Supplies and Components
column13: A.O. Smith Water Products Company engages in designing, manufacturing, and distributing commercial and residential water heaters, commercial boilers, storage tanks, and related products. It offers residential and commercial electric water heaters, residential and commercial gas water heaters, commercial oil-fired water heaters, specialty commercial systems, and pump and expansion tanks. The company has manufacturing facilities in North America, as well as Nanjing, China; and Veldhoven, the Netherlands. It also has locations in Africa, Asia, Australia, Canada, China, Europe, Mexico, the Middle East, South America, and the United States. A.O. Smith Water Products Company sells its products through plumbing wholesalers and plumbing contractors. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Ashland City, Tennessee. A.O. Smith Water Products Company operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation

column1: A.O. Smith Water Products Company B.V.
column4: Industrial Machinery and Supplies and Components
column13: A.O. Smith Water Products Company B.V. manufactures and supplies water heating equipment. It offers water heaters, such as solar water heaters, air to water heat pumps, condensing water heaters, conventional water heaters, electric water heaters, and indirect water heaters. The company also provides hot water solutions boilers and cascade systems. In addition, it offers parts, including accessories and spare parts. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Veldhoven, the Netherlands. A.O. Smith Water Products Company B.V. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation

American Water Heaters is a manufacturer of water heater products. The company's manufacturing, research and development, and corporate offices are located in Johnson City, TN. American offers a range of residential and commercial water heaters.

Development Work and Related Assets for Draft Inducers for High-Efficiency Furnace of AO Smith Corp. manufactures furnace draft inducers that are specialized blowers for the movement of air and the expulsion of hot combustion gases produced by gas-fired furnaces.
AOS Holding Company operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation

column4: Industrial Machinery and Supplies and Components
column13: APCOM, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells parts for water heaters to original equipment manufacturers in the United States. The company provides thermostats for commercial and residential water heaters; water heater dip tubes, heat traps, and pipe nipples; gas water heating system components; heating elements for residential, commercial, and spa water heaters; and polymer drain valves. It also offers steel, stainless steel, phosphor bronze, aluminum metal forming and stamping products; and custom injection molding services for thermoset plastics. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Franklin, Tennessee. As of December 28, 2001, APCOM, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation

column13: Belvedere USA Corporation designs and manufactures salon and spa furniture and furnishings in North America. It offers its products in categories, such as bowls, seating, shampoo. Additionally, it offers furniture and furnishings for styling chairs, vanities, dryers, shampoo, manicure, pedicure, reception, massage tables, hydrotherapy, and footrests and others; salon desks, workstations, and cabinets; and fabrics and laminates. The company also provides interior design services for salons and spas. It offers its products through sales representatives; and distributors and showrooms. The company was founded in 1927 and is based in Belvidere, Illinois with manufacturing facilities and showrooms in the United States, Mexico, and Canada. Belvedere USA Corporation is a former subsidiary of The Wella Corporation.

As of May 2011, Berlin Industries, Inc. was acquired by American Litho, Incorporated. Berlin Industries, Inc. provides Web offset commercial printing services in the United States. The company produces catalogs, newsletters, self mailers, post cards, magazine and newspaper inserts, buck slips, and brochures. It also offers database management, prepress, printing and bindery, equipment list, and direct mail services. Berlin Industries, Inc. was formerly known as I.S. Berlin Press and changed its name in 1976. The company was founded in 1919 and is based in Carol Stream, Illinois. Berlin Industries, Inc. operated as former subsidiary of AO Smith Corp.

Changzhou FOLAND electrical appliance CO.,LTD. manufactures thermostats, electric home appliances, and related spare parts. Its products are used in drinking water machine, water heater, washing machine, deep fryer, microwave, electric oven, and other electric home appliances. It sells its products in China, Southeast Asia, Europe, and the United States. Changzhou FOLAND electrical appliance CO.,LTD. was formerly known as Jiangsu Changheng Group Automatic control Co.,LTD. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Changzhou, China. Changzhou FOLAND electrical appliance CO.,LTD. operates as a subsidiary of Regal Beloit America, Inc.

NANOLYTIX INC. develops optical sensors that detect contamination in water, air, and food for consumer and industrial use. The company offers a hardware tool that detects microbial count, TDS and TSS levels, identifies special bacteria, visualizes contaminants in water, and also has heat mapping capabilities. It also provides multiple parameters to measure contamination, nano spectral resolutions, wavelength spectral range, and artificial intelligence for sensing. NANOLYTIX INC. was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

column13: Products de Agua, S. de R.L. de C.V. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation

Regal Beloit America, Inc. manufactures and supplies electric motors for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. It offers pool and spa; heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) equipment; and C/I motors. It serves customers through a network of distributors in the United States and internationally. Regal Beloit America, Inc. was formerly known as RBC Manufacturing Corporation and changed its name to Regal Beloit America, Inc. in August 2014. The company was incorporated in 1931 and is based in Beloit, Wisconsin with operations in the United States, Mexico, Brazil, Dubai, and Europe. As of August 22, 2011, Regal Beloit America, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Regal Rexnord Corporation.

Regal Manufacturing Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells fractional horsepower induction motors for heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration industries in the United Kingdom and internationally. It offers motors for original equipment manufacturers, including stock and non-stock replacement motors. The company also provides accessories, such as compression bands, cork gaskets, flange mountings, lugs, mounting clips, mounting rings, and shaft adapters. Regal Manufacturing Ltd was formerly known as A. O. Smith Electrical Products Limited. The company was incorporated in 1953 and is based in Gainsborough, United Kingdom. Regal Manufacturing Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Regal Rexnord Corporation.

Regal Rexnord Corporation manufactures and sells industrial powertrain solutions, power transmission components, electric motors and electronic controls, air moving products, and specialty electrical components and systems worldwide. The Industrial Powertrain Solutions segment provides mounted and unmounted bearings, couplings, mechanical power transmission drives and components, gearboxes, gear motors, clutches, brakes, special, and industrial powertrain components and solutions for food and beverage, bulk material handling, eCommerce/warehouse distribution, energy, mining, marine, agricultural machinery, turf and garden, and general industrial markets. The Power Efficiency Solutions segment offers AC and DC motors, electronic variable speed controls, and blowers for residential, commercial HVAC, water heaters, commercial refrigeration, commercial building ventilation, pool and spa, irrigation, agriculture, conveying, and general commercial equipment markets. The Automation and Motion Control segment provides conveyor products, conveying automation subsystems, aerospace components, rotary precision motion solutions, high-efficiency miniature motors, motion controls, automation transfer switches, and switchgear for industrial applications and automation systems for material handling, aerospace and defense, factory automation, data centers, medical device, packaging, printing, semiconductor, robotic, industrial power tool, mobile off-highway, food and beverage processing, and other applications. The Industrial Systems segment offers integral motors, alternators, and aftermarket parts and kits for agriculture, marine, mining, oil and gas, food and beverage, data centers, prime and standby power, and general industrial equipment markets. It sells its products directly to original equipment manufacturers, distributors, and end-users. The company was formerly known as Regal Beloit Corporation. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

column1: Smith Investment Co., Asset Management Arm
column13: Smith Investment Co., Asset Management Arm is a privately owned investment manager.

State Industries, LLC, doing business as STATE Water Heaters, develops, manufactures, and supplies residential and commercial water heaters, storage tanks, and related products. It offers propane gas water heaters, hybrid electric heat pump water heaters, high efficiency gas water heaters, tankless non-condensing water heaters, and solar water heating systems for residential applications; and gas and oil hot water heating systems, electric water heating systems, custom commercial solar water heating systems, large volume jacketed and insulated storage tanks, jacketed and insulated storage tanks, bare glass lined tanks, custom storage tanks, and non-condensing tankless water heaters for commercial applications. The company also offers customer technical support, and durable tank and parts warranty, as well as sells replacement water heater parts and kits through its online store. It offers its products to residential homeowners, wholesalers, contractors, and other members of the engineering community through distributors and sales representatives in the United States. State Industries, LLC was formerly known as State Stove and Manufacturing Company and changed its name to State Industries, LLC in 1974. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Ashland City, Tennessee. As of December 28, 2001, State Industries, LLC operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

Sun Water Systems, Inc. manufactures home water filtration systems. The company offers house water filters, salt-free water conditioners, drinking water filters, shower filters, replacement filters, and foodservice water filtration products. It markets its products through a network of dealers worldwide. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Austin, Texas. Sun Water Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

column4: Industrial Machinery and Supplies and Components
column13: Water-Right Inc. manufactures water treatment solutions for well and municipal water, residential, commercial, and industrial applications. It offers Crystal-Right media, a silica crystal for the removal of hardness, iron, and manganese, as well as softening and the treatment of problem water; and sanitizer, softener, filtration, and drinking water systems. The company also provides twin tank water conditioning systems for the removal of hardness, iron and manganese, and pH correction; heavy commercial water conditioning systems for higher flow rates; light commercial water conditioning systems for small commercial or residential applications; and industrial water conditioning systems to handle large volume applications, as well as lab testing services. It offers its products through a network of dealers, wholesalers, distributors, and water treatment professionals. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Appleton, Wisconsin. As of April 8, 2019, Water-Right Inc. operates as a subsidiary of A. O. Smith Corporation.

Water-Right, Inc. manufactures and markets water treatment systems. Mineral-Right, Inc. manufactures and markets water-purifying products for water treatment industry. The companies are based in the United States.
